_header: Now for to sing I hold it best
_description: James Ryman, a Christmas carol — six quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Nowe lete us syng and mery be / ffor crist oure kyng haþe made us fre’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Now forto syng I holde it bestAnd lete alle care and sorowe
                    goo…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Lete us alle make myrþe & solaceAnd lete us thanke
                    oure lorde of thys
CULEe112.Note: Does not have Ryman’s name attached to it in this MS.
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und

Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 35; 1977, 28-9.
